programme.title: Untold Stories of the ER
programme.desc: A patient suddenly starts seizing, and his doctors can't treat him until they figure out the cause. An ER physician is at a restaurant when she is thrown into an emergency situation to save a child. A pregnant woman's heart is racing.

programme.title: My 600-lb Life
programme.desc: Lacey is so big from overeating that she can barely leave the house, but that hasn't stopped her from finding love with Ricky. Her weight isn't the only thing between her and a happy husband, however, with Ricky's sister Sharon in the picture.

programme.title: 1000-lb Sisters
programme.desc: When Amy tries to get her house in order, she must confront some demons from her past. Tammy admits to a few cheat days just before her first doctor's appointment since rehab. Chris steps on the scale that could change his life.

programme.title: 7 Little Johnstons

programme.title: My Big Fat American Gypsy Wedding
programme.desc: Gypsy teen Maquayla can't wait to wear her dream wedding gown, but disaster strikes when a dead dress arrives for her big day! Mom plans to use Yazzie's Sweet 16 party to marry her off, but it's all-out war when her gorger boyfriend makes an appearance.

programme.title: My Big Fat American Gypsy Wedding
programme.desc: Nukkie's wedding to Jonas may be in jeopardy after an ex re-enters their lives. When the problems fall onto sister Dallas's shoulders it's a wild race to the altar. Gypsy mom Jett locks horns with her own mother over her little girl's birthday party.

programme.title: My Big Fat American Gypsy Wedding
programme.desc: Cearia plans to wed gorger fiancé Sam, but is soon in a love triangle when her cousin Kyle proclaims that they should be together. Mom Angie plans a party for her daughter Jewel, hoping to find her a Gypsy husband, but Jewel is secretly seeing a gorger.

programme.title: My Big Fat American Gypsy Wedding
programme.desc: Brittany plans a traditional Gypsy funeral for her beloved late father, hoping to reverse a curse of bad luck that began after he was cremated. Maryann will only let her daughter Lexi marry gorger Kenny if he disowns his entire family.

programme.title: My Big Fat American Gypsy Wedding
programme.desc: The Stanley family returns. Nukkie has left Pookie and is now engaged to a gorger, but war could ensue if Mellie and Annie crash her bridal shower party. When Jewel chooses to marry fellow Gypsy Nick, her former gorger suitor Josiah hatches a bold plan.

programme.title: The Family Chantel
programme.desc: The family heads to South Carolina to find out more about their ancestry, and Winter causes tension by unexpectedly bringing Jah. Pedro connects with his estranged cousin. Nicole fills in Coraima on the details of Alejandro's unfaithfulness.

programme.title: The Family Chantel
programme.desc: Pedro has enough of Chantel's judgement of his family. River is in the hot seat when he gets interrogated by Megan's friends. Alejandro seeks out relationship advice from his aunt and pleads for Nicole to give him a second chance.

programme.title: The Family Chantel
programme.desc: Karen hosts a holiday party for the whole family. Lidia vents to Pedro about Nicole's decision to get back with Alejandro. River and Pedro go on a mission for the perfect Christmas tree. Jah surprises Winter.

programme.title: The Family Chantel
programme.desc: Pedro arrives in the Dominican Republic to make peace between his family members, only to make matters worse. Winter and Jah host a dinner for the family to reveal their engagement. River decides to introduce Karen and Chantel to his girlfriend.

programme.title: 1000-lb Sisters
programme.desc: With her weight spiraling, Tammy makes a life-altering decision. Amy finally gets a taste of the life she's always wanted, but, unfortunately, it's short-lived. An emergency surgery has repercussions for Chris.

programme.title: 1000-lb Sisters
programme.desc: Tammy is back from rehab, and Amy kisses her freedom goodbye as she comes to a drastic decision regarding her sister. With his bariatric surgery on the line, Chris tries to shed the weight he's gained but is shocked when he and Tammy step on the scale.

programme.desc: Amy is upset that Tammy's new nurse isn't pushing her enough. Tammy has started slacking, and the family worries about what could be the cause. Chris and Tammy clash when he confronts her about the new man in her life.

programme.title: Obese and Pregnant

programme.title: I'm Pregnant And ...
programme.desc: Trisha has spent her pregnancy behind bars for dealing and using drugs. Up for parole, she will soon discover if she will give birth in jail or have a chance to prove that she can conquer her addiction and be the mother her child needs.

programme.title: I'm Pregnant And ...
programme.desc: Raine struggles to clear her house of clutter before her baby is born, but it isn't easy. She suffers from hoarding, but knows that despite her compulsion, it is crucial for her baby's safety to clean up her act before the birth of her son.

programme.title: I'm Pregnant And ...
programme.desc: Many pregnant women are self-conscious about their changing bodies, but not Sherri. Sherri is a third-generation nudist. As her delivery day approaches, she now must decide if she wants her daughter to continue the family legacy.

programme.title: Hoarding: Buried Alive
programme.desc: Joanne's hoarding is so extreme that the city has already sent her to jail four times.

programme.title: Hoarding: Buried Alive
programme.desc: Geoffrey has already lost his home. Now, he has just 30 days to clear the clutter from the home or he will lose everything that remains inside it - including his two children.

programme.title: Hoarding: Buried Alive
programme.desc: One mother's battle with hoarding is overshadowed by the discovery of her own daughter's compulsion to hold on to things, while another mother is putting her family's unity on the line and her husband's life at risk with her own extreme hoarding problem.

programme.title: My 600-lb Life
programme.desc: In the fourth year of his weight loss journey, Sean struggles to get past the loss of his mother and live on his own. Dr. Now intervenes to control Sean's eating for a time, but if Sean can't learn to control himself, he will face consequences.

programme.title: My 600-lb Life
programme.desc: Steven heals from his weight loss surgery. His brother, Justin, finally decides to come to Texas to have the same procedure done. His feelings towards his brother, however, may sabotage his hopes of surgery.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: A loving, churchgoing grandmother is found stabbed to death in her apartment, leaving Joe Kenda to wonder what sort of monster could do such a thing. Then When Kenda investigates the mysterious death of a successful dentist, the case gets personal.

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: The CSIs appear to have an open and shut case after a murder suspect is impaled during a police pursuit, but it turns out the investigation is just beginning.

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: Young brides-to-be fight over a killer dress at the biggest wedding gown sale of the year and one of the girls winds up dead. The unusual clues of this case force Dr. Hawkes to confront a painful chapter from his past.

programme.title: Highway Thru Hell
programme.desc: In British Columbia, a truck full of wine is sliced in half. Howie is left to tackle his recovery on his own. Al Quiring and Adam Gazzola deal with wrecks on two separate highways.

programme.title: Highway Thru Hell
programme.desc: After lumber spills across a busy highway, Howie faces an impossible challenge. In northern Alberta, the crew puts the Rotator to the test dealing with heavy industrial wrecks in extreme weather.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: The wardens work around the clock to handle turkey hunting season and smelt runs. A search warrant is needed upon the discovery of poached turkeys. The wardens come across many animals including orphaned baby foxes, nuisance beavers and a python.

programme.title: Street Outlaws: No Prep Kings
programme.desc: In Tucson, the 405 finds out that Texas may have broken the rules before the race even starts and the group must decide whether Texas should be disqualified. One dispute leads to another and two racers emerge as the front-runners amidst all the drama.

programme.title: Street Outlaws: No Prep Kings: Team Attacks
programme.desc: Racers return to Colorado for another Team Attack event. B-Rad comes out swinging in the first round to put The Dean's List in a position to win. Kayla Morton makes her first appearance of the season and Daddy Dave is back with his car rebuilt.

programme.title: North Woods Law

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: The wardens battle illegal marijuana across the state. It is dangerous work that often sees armed individuals protecting their land. Three teens are involved in an ATV crash that has the wardens stumped.

programme.title: Mighty Cruise Ships
programme.desc: Life aboard Europa 2 is all about luxury, offering more space per passenger than any other ship; this vessel's credo is 'Small ships make big things happen'.

programme.title: Mighty Cruise Ships
programme.desc: Viking Sea is the second ocean-going vessel launched by the owners of Viking River Cruises; it features fine food, dramatic destinations, and Scandinavian décor.

programme.title: Mighty Cruise Ships
programme.desc: Carnival Vista is the new flagship for one of the world's largest cruise lines. It carries more than 4,600 passengers and boasts 10 restaurants, nearly 2,000 staterooms and a crew of 1,400 ready to tend to guests' every need.

programme.title: Mighty Cruise Ships
programme.desc: Royal Clipper is the largest sailing cruise ship in the world, with five masts soaring 58 metres high, supporting 42 sails carrying the ship to a speed of 17 knots.

programme.title: Mighty Cruise Ships
programme.desc: With an ice-strengthened hull and a fleet of zodiacs, Ocean Endeavour is the perfect vessel for adventure; the staff are experts in arctic ice, wildlife, and natural history.

programme.title: Mighty Cruise Ships
programme.desc: MSC Divina features the best of Mediterranean design and North American convenience; carrying 4,200 passengers, a cruise on this ship offers the best of Europe on board, with stops at the top ports in the Caribbean.

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: Anglers are out all over Texas. In Houston County, a Game Warden returns after a life-threatening injury. Along the coast, fishermen get caught with too many sharks. A protected turtle gets relocated and anglers on the Gulf learn how to tag fish.

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: A hunter is confronted for killing a deer with a gun in bowhunting only season. A man is questioned for being in possession of venomous copperhead snakes. While checking bowhunters at night, a game warden helps find an injured hunter.

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: It's the opening of deer and oyster season in Texas. On the Gulf, Game Wardens find illegal undersized oysters. In East Texas, Game Wardens patrol deer camps. An owl is rescued from a chicken coop and set free.

programme.title: Lone Star Law

programme.title: Mighty Trains
programme.desc: Norway's Bergen Line stretches nearly 500 kilometres from Oslo to Bergen, passing through 182 tunnels; Nordland Line transports passengers and freight; Flam Railway boasts one of the steepest railway climbs on Earth.

programme.title: Mighty Trains
programme.desc: Hop aboard the Indian Pacific for a four-day, 4,352-kilometre transcontinental journey across Australia, a trip which features the world's longest straight stretch of railway and steepest incline railway.

programme.title: Mighty Trains
programme.desc: Travel on the State Railway of Thailand, and explore the famed 'Death Railway'. The trains travel through ancient areas, historic tunnels, and raging rivers.

programme.title: Mighty Trains
programme.desc: Board South Africa's Rovos Rail for a journey from Pretoria to Cape Town in classic carriages pulled by a series of steam, diesel and electric locomotives.

programme.desc: We check out Switzerland's Bernina Express, which is one of the world's most beautiful train journeys, especially in winter. One of three railway lines on the UNESCO World Heritage List, it navigates 55 tunnels and nearly 200 viaducts and bridges.

programme.title: Treehouse Masters

programme.title: Treehouse Masters

programme.title: The Zoo

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: An apparent suicide turns out to be a much more menacing scenario involving a black widow.

programme.title: Forensic Files

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A woman is brutally murdered and police point to her fiancé when they learn that he was having affairs with other women. It is not until a man comes forward with information that he is no longer a suspect.

programme.title: Forensic Files

programme.title: Forensic Files

programme.title: Forensic Files

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When a young college student is found dead in her apartment, an autopsy rules the suspicious death a homicide. Months later, investigators learn about an incident from the victim's past which gives them some clues.

programme.title: Forensic Files

programme.desc: Tanya Buschman is just getting out of a nasty marriage when she falls for a handsome bartender, but it's not long before jealousy in their relationship leads to a suspicious suicide.

programme.desc: When Mirinda marries Sam, everyone is happy because she's pretty and he's cute and friendly; Mirinda's spending veers out of control, tearing the couple apart until one of them looks outside the marriage -- and finds nothing short of murder.

programme.title: Forbidden: Dying for Love
programme.desc: A woman searching for acceptance from her family unexpectedly finds passionate love with her uncle; when their families turn on them, they flee to start a new life in paradise.

programme.desc: When 70-year-old retired firefighter Michael Chambers goes missing, a bloody crime scene in his garage indicates foul play; then, authorities begin to believe that the crime scene may have been staged.

programme.desc: In Missouri, bible teacher Lynn Messer goes missing from her family's farmhouse, and investigators must decipher a cryptic handwritten note; two years later, skeletal remains are found in a wooded area on Messer's farm.

programme.desc: When two teenage girls fall in love, their hedonistic lifestyle is played out on social media for all to see; behind the facade, petty jealousies and insecurities escalate until finally the pressure erupts in a frenzy of shocking violence.

programme.desc: Claude Garrett says he tried to rescue his girlfriend, Lorie Lee Lance, from a fire that broke out in their home, but a jury decided he was the one who set the fire with one goal in mind: murder.

programme.desc: Yvonne Layne, a mother of five, dies due to a murder plot masterminded by her ex, David Thorne, and carried out by his friend; both men are convicted; David's family refuses to accept the verdict and wants Chris and Fatima to help.

programme.desc: A jury convicts Glynn Simmons of a liquor store clerk's murder, but Glynn insists he was out of state during the killing.

programme.desc: Ken Andersen and Chad Swedberg are childhood best friends; Chad turns up dead on a wooded trail, and Ken takes the fall for his murder; Ken's family says the conviction is a gross miscarriage of justice and wants Chris and Fatima to investigate.

programme.desc: Playing a cat-and-mouse game, police hunt for the heartless killer of a student.

programme.desc: In California police face off against a knife-wielding bodybuilder; a wanted criminal draws an officer into a brawl in a sex shop, and a fleeing suspect drives a car directly at officers to escape.

programme.title: Body Cam

programme.title: Your Worst Nightmare
programme.desc: Shelia Dates and her daughter Regina are more than blood relatives; they're best friends and roommates too.

programme.title: Your Worst Nightmare
programme.desc: Retired NYPD Detective Chris Hanney stands accused of trying to kill his estranged wife, Audrey Mabrey, by setting her on fire.

programme.title: Your Worst Nightmare
programme.desc: Twenty-year-old Kristy Ray is living at home and attending college, then she is abducted; local police seek out the help of the FBI and community members as they race to find Kristy before time runs out.

programme.title: Your Worst Nightmare
programme.desc: Tammie Craycraft Smith, a 30-year-old divorcee, finds herself working two jobs to make ends meet; her trusting nature and desire to be loved leave her vulnerable to deception, betrayal and murder.

The Kings of Summer
programme.desc: Three teenagers (Nick Robinson, Gabriel Basso, Moises Arias) carry out a plan to leave their dysfunctional parents, build a house in the woods and live off the land.

programme.title: Aliens
programme.desc: After floating in space for 57 years, Lt. Ripley's (Sigourney Weaver) shuttle is found by a deep space salvage team. Upon arriving at LV-426, the marines find only one survivor, a nine year old girl named Newt (Carrie Henn). But even these battle-hardened marines with all the latest weaponry are no match for the hundreds of aliens that have invaded the colony.

programme.title: Cut Bank
programme.desc: Things go from bad to worse when a murder witness (Liam Hemsworth) in small-town Montana tries to leverage the crime into a get-rich-quick scheme.

programme.title: Embattled
programme.desc: The eldest son of a ruthlessly tough MMA champion must fight his way out of the abusive cycle his father has continued.

programme.title: Six Minutes to Midnight
programme.desc: With Germany and the United Kingdom on the brink of war, an undercover British agent poses as a teacher at a finishing school for daughters of high-ranking Nazis.

programme.title: Big Sur
programme.desc: Jack Duluoz takes three trips to poet Lawrence Ferlinghetti's cabin in Big Sur.

programme.title: Gridiron Gang
programme.desc: A counselor (The Rock) at a juvenile detention facility decides to turn the young inmates in his charge into a football team to give them a sense of self-respect and social responsibility, but he faces opposition from high-school coaches who do not want their players facing criminals on the field.

programme.title: Christmas at the Chateau
programme.desc: Three sisters try to save the Shakespeare Chateau, a historic mansion and beloved family home, from a corrupt bank that threatens to foreclose on Christmas Day.

programme.title: The Spy Next Door
programme.desc: Bob Ho (Jackie Chan), an undercover operative for the CIA, decides to give up his career and marry his girlfriend, Gillian (Amber Valletta). First however, he has one more mission to complete: Gain the approval of Gillian's children. Bob volunteers to baby-sit when Gillian is called away, but the operation hits a snag when one of the kids mistakenly downloads a top-secret formula, and a Russian terrorist takes aim at Bob's prospective family.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?
programme.desc: Attempting to win the favor of the newly divorced Suzanne (Nia Long), Nick (Ice Cube) offers to accompany her children, Lindsey (Aleisha Allen) and Kevin (Philip Bolden), on a flight from Portland, Ore., to Canada to see their mother. A mishap with a corkscrew and a metal detector gets the troupe banned from the flight, however, so Nick is forced to drive the kids in his prized Lincoln Navigator. Tensions inevitably rise during the long road trip, but Nick is not to be deterred.

programme.title: The Last Tree
programme.desc: After growing up in quiet, rural Lincolnshire, teenager Femi struggles with unfamiliar surroundings and cultural differences when he moves in with his mother in London.

programme.title: Fried Green Tomatoes
programme.desc: On one of trapped housewife Evelyn Couch's (Kathy Bates) Wednesday nursing home visits, she encounters Ninny Threadgoode (Jessica Tandy), a colorful old woman who brightens Evelyn's outlook by sharing tales from her past. As Ninny recounts the exploits of her free-spirited sister-in-law Idgie (Mary Stuart Masterson), owner of a small Alabama café in the 1920s, and the bond Idgie shared with her friend Ruth (Mary-Louise Parker), Evelyn gains the confidence to change her own life for the better.

programme.title: Casino
programme.desc: In early-1970s Las Vegas, low-level mobster Sam "Ace" Rothstein (Robert De Niro) gets tapped by his bosses to head the Tangiers Casino. At first, he's a great success in the job, but over the years, problems with his loose-cannon enforcer Nicky Santoro (Joe Pesci), his ex-hustler wife Ginger (Sharon Stone), her con-artist ex Lester Diamond (James Woods) and a handful of corrupt politicians put Sam in ever-increasing danger. Martin Scorsese directs this adaptation of Nicholas Pileggi's book.

programme.title: Scarface
programme.desc: After getting a green card in exchange for assassinating a Cuban government official, Tony Montana (Al Pacino) stakes a claim on the drug trade in Miami. Viciously murdering anyone who stands in his way, Tony eventually becomes the biggest drug lord in the state, controlling nearly all the cocaine that comes through Miami. But increased pressure from the police, wars with Colombian drug cartels and his own drug-fueled paranoia serve to fuel the flames of his eventual downfall.

programme.title: Carlito's Way
programme.desc: A free man after years in prison, Carlito Brigante (Al Pacino) intends to give up his criminal ways, but it's not long before the ex-con is sucked back into the New York City underworld. Reconnecting with his dancer girlfriend, Gail (Penelope Ann Miller), Carlito gets entangled in the shady dealings of his friend Dave Kleinfeld (Sean Penn), who also serves as his lawyer. When Carlito and Kleinfeld run afoul of shifty gangster Benny Blanco (John Alberto Leguizamo), it sets them on a dangerous path.

programme.title: The To Do List
programme.desc: It's 1993, and high-school valedictorian Brandy Klark (Aubrey Plaza) decides she needs to shed her uptight image before college. She puts together a list of all the activities -- including sex -- she missed in high school. When she soon realizes she is out of her depth, Brandy enlists the aid of her friends, older sister, and boss. Summer marches on, and members of the group realize that they will need plenty of imagination and open mindedness to complete her project before September.

programme.title: Soul Plane
programme.desc: Following a ridiculously awful flight that leads to his pet's death, Nashawn Wade (Kevin Hart) files a lawsuit against the airline, and wins a multimillion-dollar settlement. Determined to create a better flying experience, Nashawn starts his own airline, one that caters to an African-American clientele. Going into business with a tricked-out plane piloted by the smooth Capt. Mack (Snoop "Doggy" Dogg), the airline hits a snag when it has to deal with the family of Elvis Hunkee (Tom Arnold).

programme.title: Fully Realized Humans
programme.desc: An expectant couple confront their deepest fears and greatest shortcomings less than one month before their due date.

programme.title: Waves
programme.desc: The epic emotional journey of a suburban African American family as they navigate love, forgiveness and coming together in the wake of a tragic loss.

programme.title: 2nd Chance for Christmas
programme.desc: After trading love for fame and fortune long ago, a spoiled pop star is visited by the spirits of Christmas past, present and future.

During World War I, two British soldiers -- Lance Cpl. Schofield and Lance Cpl. Blake -- receive seemingly impossible orders. In a race against time, they must cross over into enemy territory to deliver a message that could potentially save 1,600 of their fellow comrades -- including Blake's own brother.

programme.title: Mine 9
programme.desc: Miners struggle to survive after an explosion leaves them trapped two miles underground.

programme.title: My Salinger Year
programme.desc: While working for literary agent Phyllis Westberg, aspiring writer Joanna Rakoff receives personal advice from reclusive author J.D. Salinger.

programme.title: Gloria Bell
programme.desc: A free-spirited divorcee spends her nights on the dance floor, joyfully letting loose at clubs around Los Angeles. She soon finds herself thrust into an unexpected new romance, filled with the joys of budding love and the complications of dating.

programme.title: Minari
programme.desc: A Korean American family moves to an Arkansas farm in search of its own American dream. Amidst the challenges of this new life in the strange and rugged Ozarks, they discover the undeniable resilience of family and what really makes a home.

programme.title: JFK Revisited: Through the Looking Glass
programme.desc: Filmmaker Oliver Stone examines the circumstances surrounding the assassination of President John F. Kennedy on Nov. 22, 1963, in Dallas.

programme.title: Fruitvale Station
programme.desc: Though he once spent time in San Quentin, 22-year-old black man Oscar Grant (Michael B. Jordan) is now trying hard to live a clean life and support his girlfriend (Melonie Diaz) and young daughter (Ariana Neal). Flashbacks reveal the last day in Oscar's life, in which he accompanied his family and friends to San Francisco to watch fireworks on New Year's Eve, and, on the way back home, became swept up in an altercation with police that ended in tragedy. Based on a true story.

programme.title: Minari
programme.desc: A Korean American family moves to an Arkansas farm in search of its own American dream. Amidst the challenges of this new life in the strange and rugged Ozarks, they discover the undeniable resilience of family and what really makes a home.

programme.title: Quintet
programme.desc: A frozen wasteland is the scene of an unusual game of life or death where the victims fight to remain alive.

programme.title: Wizards
programme.desc: After the death of his mother, the evil mutant wizard Blackwolf (Steve Gravers) discovers some long-lost military technologies. Full of ego and ambition, Blackwolf claims his mother's throne, assembles an army and sets out to brainwash and conquer Earth. Meanwhile, Blackwolf's gentle twin brother, the bearded and sage Avatar (Bob Holt), calls upon his own magical abilities to foil Blackwolf's plans for world domination -- even if it means destroying his own flesh and blood.

programme.title: Alita: Battle Angel
programme.desc: Set several centuries in the future, the abandoned Alita is found in the scrapyard of Iron City by Ido, a compassionate cyber-doctor who takes the unconscious cyborg Alita to his clinic. When Alita awakens, she has no memory of who she is, nor does she have any recognition of the world she finds herself in. As Alita learns to navigate her new life and the treacherous streets of Iron City, Ido tries to shield her from her mysterious past.

programme.title: Black and Blue
programme.desc: A rookie policewoman in New Orleans inadvertently captures the shooting death of a young drug dealer on her body cam. After realizing the murder was committed by corrupt cops, she teams up with the only person from the community who's willing to help her. Now, she finds herself on the run from both the vengeful criminals and the lawmen who desperately want to destroy the incriminating footage.

programme.title: Hidden Figures
programme.desc: Three brilliant African American women at NASA -- Katherine Johnson, Dorothy Vaughan and Mary Jackson -- serve as the brains behind one of the greatest operations in history: the launch of astronaut John Glenn into orbit, a stunning achievement that restored the nation's confidence, turned around the Space Race and galvanized the world.

programme.title: The Visit
programme.desc: Becca (Olivia DeJonge) and younger brother Tyler (Ed Oxenbould) say goodbye to their mother as they board a train and head deep into Pennsylvania farm country to meet their maternal grandparents for the first time. Welcomed by Nana (Deanna Dunagan) and Pop Pop (Peter McRobbie), all seems well until the siblings start to notice increasingly strange behavior from the seemingly charming couple. Once the children discover a shocking secret, they begin to wonder if they'll ever make it home.

programme.title: FXM Presents
programme.desc: An examination of the process of making movies follows a production from script to screen.

programme.title: Tony Rome
programme.desc: Ex-cop-turned-private eye Tony Rome (Frank Sinatra) needs work, so when his former partner shows up with a seemingly easy job tracking down a spoiled heiress (Sue Lyon), Tony jumps on the case. He finds the woman quickly, but when her father (Simon Oakland) discovers that her jewelry has gone missing, he hires Tony to find the thieves. Tony's investigation angers the wrong people, and when his partner ends up dead, he discovers there may be more to this case than some missing jewelry.

programme.desc: An accused man (Don Marlowe) helps a policeman (Paul Bryar) investigate an airplane mechanic's death and a counterfeit racket.

programme.title: The Detective
programme.desc: When a gay man is viciously slain, Detective Joe Leland (Frank Sinatra) is put on the case. Joe eventually tracks down the victim's roommate, who confesses to the crime and is sentenced to death; however, the outcome of the case doesn't sit well with the detective. Norma (Jacqueline Bisset), a distraught widow, visits Joe. She believes her husband's death was no accident, but the cops don't seem to care. Joe begins to investigate, and stumbles on a cover-up related to his previous case.

programme.title: Eyewitness
programme.desc: New York City custodian Daryll Deever (William Hurt) is a big fan of local news reporter Tony Sokolow (Sigourney Weaver), so he is intrigued when she shows up to cover a story at his workplace. There's been a murder in the office building, and Tony suspects that Daryll may have insight into the crime, a notion that he furthers to stay close to her. However, when those behind the killing begin to think that Daryll really knows something, they target both him and Tony to keep their secrets hidden.

programme.desc: A rookie policewoman in New Orleans inadvertently captures the shooting death of a young drug dealer on her body cam. After realizing the murder was committed by corrupt cops, she teams up with the only person from the community who's willing to help her. Now, she finds herself on the run from both the vengeful criminals and the lawmen who desperately want to destroy the incriminating footage.

programme.title: The Art of Racing in the Rain
programme.desc: Denny Swift is a Formula One race car driver who understands that the techniques needed on the racetrack can also be used to successfully navigate everyday life. Besides his career, Denny has three loves of his life -- his beautiful wife, their young daughter and his best friend, which is a dog that wants to be reincarnated into a human.

programme.title: The Revenant
programme.desc: While exploring the uncharted wilderness in 1823, frontiersman Hugh Glass (Leonardo DiCaprio) sustains life-threatening injuries from a brutal bear attack. When a member (Tom Hardy) of his hunting team kills his young son (Forrest Goodluck) and leaves him for dead, Glass must utilize his survival skills to find a way back to civilization. Grief-stricken and fueled by vengeance, the legendary fur trapper treks through the snowy terrain to track down the man who betrayed him.

programme.title: The Revenant
